page.title: 08ASCOT SCHOOLS
page.content: St. George's: This is an independent public school for girls. There are 240 pupils aged 11 to 18 years.75% of the girls are boarders.Entrance is by examination. Papplewick: A Preparatory boarding school for 175 boys aged from 7 to 14 years.The school is set in 15 acres of land adjacent to Ascot Race course. Marist Convent: A day and boarding school conducted by Marist Sisters.Day girls attend between the ages of 4 to 18 years,girl boarders 11 to 18 and day boys 4 to 8. Entrance is by examination. Primary Schools: There are a number of Primary schools that feed these schools and the local State Secondary school.
